articles.content: Stories are dangerous things. They surround us, even if were not necessarily aware of them. In their primal allure, they can command all of our attention, to the point where nothing else matters. We … [+4397 chars]

articles.title: Mike Tyson fact check: What's real, what's not in the wild new Hulu drama - USA TODAY
articles.description: "Mike," the controversial Hulu drama about boxing legend Mike Tyson, details his over-the-top lifestyle with pet tigers and pigeons. How much is true?
